reference.title: GetIpmiConfig
reference.shortdesc: You can use the GetIpmiConfig method to retrieve hardware sensor information from sensors that are in your node.

section.title: Parameter
section.p: This method has the following input parameter:

row.entry:
Used to display information for each node chassis type. Possible values:
all: returns sensor information for each chassis type.
{chassis type}: returns sensor information for a specified chassis type.

section.title: Return values
section.p: This method has the following return values:

row.entry: Name of the sensor that has been found.

section.title: Request example
section.p: Requests for this method are similar to the following example:
